---
title: IPlistApi.plist_array_append_item method
---

Append a new item at the end of a #PLIST_ARRAY node.

```csharp
public void plist_array_append_item(PlistHandle node, PlistHandle item)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node of type #PLIST_ARRAY |
| item | the new item. The array is responsible for freeing item when it is no longer needed. |
